channel.title: Essential services for bootstrapped startup. Covid19 edition
channel.description:
Here is our list:
* Office 365 - 6 users / $32 / month * HubSpot Marketing edition - $54 / month * Zendesk support + knowledge base - $68 / month for 2 agents * Paywrill (billing and subscriptions management) - $49 / month * Feature Upvote (legacy plan) - $23 / month * Invocely - $10 / month * Altasian Bitbucket - 10 users / $10 / month

item.title: Essential services for bootstrapped startup. Covid19 edition
item.dc:creator: Nicolas_Wegener
item.description:
I’d love to add my startup to the mix here!? I founded Send2 (Send Squared) and we offer flat-rate pricing ($35 / month) for our marketing platform (email & sms).

I’m new to bootstrapped - and I guess I can’t add links.

Read full topic
item.source: Essential services for bootstrapped startup. Covid19 edition
